name: Andrzej Ito
profile_summary: As a Link Building Team Lead Assistant, I possess extensive expertise in **SEO**, **link building**, and **outreach**, combined with proficient use of tools like **Ahrefs** and **Google Sheets** to drive effective campaigns. My exceptional organizational, communication, and reporting skills ensure that projects are executed with precision and attention to detail. With over 9 years of experience as a Senior Software Engineer, I excel in leading cross-functional teams and mentoring junior staff, while consistently delivering impactful projects that prioritize user experience and innovation.

experience.responsibilities:
• Demonstrate exceptional **organizational skills** to manage link building efforts effectively, ensuring timely outreach and follow-up with potential partners.
• Showcase strong **communication skills** while collaborating with team members and external stakeholders to enhance relationships and build backlinks.
• Utilize **Google Sheets** for meticulous tracking of outreach campaigns, link placements, and performance metrics, contributing to comprehensive reporting on progress.
• Apply **SEO** techniques and strategies to identify high-value opportunities for link acquisition, increasing website authority and search rankings.
• Generate insights based on data analytics tools such as **Ahrefs** to report on link health and campaign effectiveness, making data-driven recommendations for optimization.
• Exhibit a **detail-oriented** approach when reviewing and curating content for outreach to ensure alignment with brand standards and target audience.
• Conduct outreach efforts that result in a measurable increase in domain authority by **up to 30%** over a campaign period.
• Lead monthly reports outlining **link building initiatives** and their SEO impact, enabling stakeholders to understand the value added to the company's digital presence.

• Developed and implemented outreach strategies to boost link building efforts, enhancing SEO performance by over **30%** in **6** months.
• Conducted detailed reports utilizing **Google Sheets** to track progress and results of SEO initiatives, ensuring effective communication within the team.
• Collaborated with team members to create organized workflows that improved efficiency by **20%**, utilizing strong organizational skills.
• Ensured meticulous attention to detail when vetting potential link building opportunities, leading to higher-quality backlinks and improved site authority.
• Engaged with various outreach platforms, analyzing metrics with **Ahrefs** to optimize link building strategies.
• Delivered regular updates and reports to management, utilizing excellent communication skills to explain complex SEO concepts.
• Implemented effective link building tactics while maintaining a focus on long-term SEO goals, leveraging advanced reporting skills to assess overall impact.

- Conducted effective outreach campaigns to improve link building strategies and enhance overall SEO performance.
- Utilized **Ahrefs** for comprehensive site audits and competitor analysis to inform link building efforts.
- Developed and maintained organized reporting structures using **Google Sheets** to track link acquisition and outreach success.
- Demonstrated strong organizational skills by managing multiple link building projects simultaneously, ensuring all deadlines were met.
- Fostered effective communication within the team and with external partners to optimize collaboration and link building initiatives.
- Ensured that all outreach communications were detail-oriented and tailored, improving response rates and link placements.
- Engaged in post-campaign reporting to analyze results and refine future outreach strategies.
- Maintained consistency in the measurement of outreach effectiveness by tracking metrics on link performance, reaching a **15%** increase in acquisition rates over **6 months**.
- Led a team that successfully built links for over **150** unique domains, enhancing website authority significantly.

skills:
**Programming Languages** 
	Java, C++, C#, Python, SQL, PLSQL, Kotlin

 **Backend Frameworks** 
	Spring, Spring Boot, Hibernate, Struts, JPA, Node.js

 **Frontend Frameworks** 
	React, Vue, Angular

 **API Technologies** 
	SOAP, REST APIs, Microservices

 **Databases** 
	MS SQL Server, Oracle, MongoDB, PostgreSQL, Redis

 **Other**
